channel.title: Drinktober archives on Drinktober 2022
channel.description: Recent content in Drinktober archives on Drinktober 2022

item.title: It’s nacho beer
item.description: Well apparently when I’m sober I get tired like a regular person, hence I fell asleep at 9pm last night on the sofa 🤦🏼‍♀️ Today I am once again hopped up on water and black coffee, and #whatidowithoutthepub turns out to be work all day. However, to cheer my sober self up Let’s take a moment to appreciate my ridiculous homemade tortilla nachos which I think we can all agree are fairly impressive!
